[[Version 1.2]]
*Prototype Malice was renamed to Prototype Amber.
*The description for Prototype Amber's effect was changed.
**{{Color|Old description:}} Using an Elemental Burst regenerates 4 Energy every 2s for 6s. <span class="bg-highlight">Additionally,</span> all party members will regenerate 4% HP every 2s for this duration.
**{{Color|New description:}} Using an Elemental Burst regenerates 4 Energy every 2s for 6s. All party members will regenerate 4% HP every 2s for this duration.
----
[[Version 1.0]]
*Prototype Malice was available upon the game's initial release.
